snippet: The sports radio talk show host on WFAN-AM appeared to nod off during an interview on Monday, but he says no. "I was dragging during the show," is the most he will concede.
abstract: The sports radio talk show host on WFAN-AM appeared to nod off during an interview on Monday, but he says no. "I was dragging during the show," is the most he will concede.

headline.main: My Eyes Were Heavy, but I Didn't Doze Off During the Show, Mike Francesa Says
